Package game.dinosaurs

Class Allosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.Dinosaur
game.dinosaurs.Allosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, Huntable, Visitable
public class Allosaur
extends Dinosaur
implements Huntable
A carnivorous dinosaur. It can attack Stegosaur when hungry. It can eat corpse and eggs of dinosaurs. It can eat tiny dinosaurs in one bite.

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Get Allosaur's intrinsic weapon when doing an attack action, as it should not have a real weapon. If the Allosaur is an adult Allosaur, it will attack and heal for 20 hit points. If it is a baby Allosaur, it will only attack and heal for 10 hit points.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
      Returns:
      Allosaur's Intrinsic weapon.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Every turn for Allosaur, it will check if the flag preys (previously attacked dinosaurs) has been unharmed by this Allosaur for 20 turns. If true, remove from flag candidates, otherwise increase the turns of left unharmed.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      The action to be performed by this Allosaur this turn.

    • isAdult

      public boolean isAdult()
      Checks if the Dinosaur is in adult growth stage with their age.
      Specified by:
      isAdult in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if age is larger or equal growth stage of adult Allosaur. False otherwise.

    • isHungry

      public boolean isHungry()
      Checks if Allosaur is hungry.
      Specified by:
      isHungry in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if the hit points of Allosaur is below 90. False otherwise.

    • canBreed

      public boolean canBreed()
      Checks if Allosaur has enough hit points to bread with other dinosaur.
      Specified by:
      canBreed in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if the hit points of Allosaur is above or equal 50. False otherwise.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if Allosaur is alive with turns they have been unconscious.
      Specified by:
      isAlive in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      True if the turns they have been unconscious are less than 15. False otherwise.

    • isGivingBirth

      Specified by:
      isGivingBirth in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
